snippet: Sun Life Financial, Canada's third-largest life insurance company, announced a deal to sell its annuity and some life insurance businesses in the United States to a company whose owners include Guggenheim Partners.
abstract: Sun Life Financial, Canada's third-largest life insurance company, announced a deal to sell its annuity and some life insurance businesses in the United States to a company whose owners include Guggenheim Partners.

headline.main: Sun Life to Sell U.S. Annuity Business for $1.35 Billion
